results.name: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} d*binomial(n/d+d-2,d-1).
comment: Equals row sums of triangle A157497. [_Gary W. Adamson_ & _Mats Granvik_, Mar 01 2009]
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) N=66; x='x+O('x^N); Vec(sum(k=1, N, k*x^k/(1-x^k)^k)) \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Sep 03 2019
results.author: _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 21 2009
